content.question: On the basis of electronegativity differences between atoms, which of the following scientific claims is the most accurate regarding the bonding in <math alttext="M g, open parenthesis, N O 3, close parenthesis, 2, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Mg(NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>)</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>(</mtext><mi>s</mi><mtext>)</mtext></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: There is polar covalent bonding between <math alttext="M g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Mg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> atoms and <math alttext="N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> atoms.

There is polar covalent bonding between <math alttext="M g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Mg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> atoms and <math alttext="O" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> atoms.

There is ionic bonding between <math alttext="N with a positive 5 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> ions and <math alttext="O with a negative 2 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> ions.

There is ionic bonding between <math alttext="M g with a positive 2 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>Mg</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> ions and <math alttext="N O 3 with a negative 1 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> ions.

content.answer: There is ionic bonding between <math alttext="M g with a positive 2 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>Mg</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> ions and <math alttext="N O 3 with a negative 1 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> ions.
